solution_line_template: Let X be the number of chickens Mr. Rainwater has. He has {goats_per_cow} goats/cow * {num_cows} cows = <<{goats_per_cow}*{num_cows}={num_goats}>>{num_goats} goats on his farm.
So he has {num_goats} goats / {goats_per_chicken} goats/chicken = <<{num_goats}/{goats_per_chicken}={num_chickens}>>{num_chickens} chickens.
